item.title: Michael Bublé - I Believe in You - Key of A, G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song I Believe in You performed by Michael Bublé. Chords used in the song: A, Am, Bm7, C, Cm, Csus2, D, E, Em, F♯m, G.

item.title: Extreme - More Than Words - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song More Than Words performed by Extreme. Chords used in the song: Am7, Bm7, C, Cm, D, D7, Em, G, G/B, G7, G7/B.

item.title: Billy Joel - Just The Way You Are - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Just The Way You Are performed by Billy Joel. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B, B7, Bm7, D, Dm, Dmaj7, E, Em, Esus4, F, F♯m, F♯m6, G.
